definition.name: Upload a Release Asset
definition.description: Upload a release asset to an existing release in your repository
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: upload_url
inputs.description: The URL for uploading assets to the release

inputs.name: asset_path
inputs.description: The path to the asset you want to upload

inputs.name: asset_name
inputs.description: The name of the asset you want to upload

inputs.name: asset_content_type
inputs.description: The content-type of the asset you want to upload. See the supported Media Types here: https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml for more information

outputs.name: browser_download_url
outputs.description: The URL users can navigate to in order to download the uploaded asset
